metadata.Title: CVE-2021-29923 on Ubuntu 20.04 ESM (focal) - medium
metadata.Description: Go before 1.17 does not properly consider extraneous zero characters at thebeginning of an IP address octet, which (in some situations) allowsattackers to bypass access control that is based on IP addresses, becauseof unexpected octal interpretation. This affects net.ParseIP andnet.ParseCIDR.

criterions.comment: golang-1.13 package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
golang-1.14 package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
golang-1.16 package in esm-apps/focal is affected and may need fixing.
